verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting, There’s a place that is wondrously fair; For it glows with the light of His presence, ’Tis the beautiful garden of prayer.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O the beautiful garden, the garden of prayer, O the beautiful garden of prayer; There my Savior awaits, and He opens the gates To the beautiful garden of prayer.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting, And I go with my burden and care, Just to learn from His lips words of comfort In the beautiful garden of prayer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting, And He bids you to come meet Him there; Just to bow, and receive a new blessing, In the beautiful garden of prayer.
